price: उन्होंने कहा : बल्कि हमने अपने बाप-दादा को पाया कि वे ऐसा ही करते थे।
arabic: قَالُواْ بَلۡ وَجَدۡنَآ ءَابَآءَنَا كَذَٰلِكَ يَفۡعَلُونَ

version.title: Hindi Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indian by Azizul-Haqq Al-Umary.

meta.transliteration: qālū bal wajadnā ābāanā kadhālika yafʿalūna
